# Resource: samsungcloudplatform_certificate_self_sign

Provides a Certificate resource.


## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "samsungcloudplatform_certificate_self_sign" "my_selfSign" {
  name = var.name
  common_name = "sds"
  organization_name = "test"
  start_date = "2025-07-16"
  expiration_date = "2025-07-19"
  recipients {
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `expiration_date` (String) Certificate Expiration Date
- `name` (String) Certificate Name
- `organization_name` (String) Organization Name
- `recipients` (Block List, Min: 1) recipients (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--recipients))
- `start_date` (String) Certificate Start Date

### Optional

- `common_name` (String) Common Name
- `tags` (Map of String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--recipients"></a>
### Nested Schema for `recipients`

Optional:

- `email` (String)
- `user_id` (String)
- `user_name` (String)
